data.what_is:
For almost 40 years, AllenComm has partnered with Fortune 100 companies to create transformative learning experiences. Extensive instructional design experience, innovative learning technologies, and agency-level creative teams enable AllenComm to design, develop, and deploy unique learning solutions that support your business transformation.
Considered one of the top ten firms of its kind in the country, AllenComm wins over 40 awards year after year for impactful training programs in employee onboarding, leadership development, brand, compliance, and sales enablement.

Consulting and Analysis

Our training consultants utilize a variety of assessment methodologies to ensure your training initiatives meet your business objectives. The AllenComm Rapid Needs Analysis helps you get to the bottom of your training challenges quickly and effectively. Or we can work with you through an Extensive Needs Analysis to determine the best plan of action based on data we gather together.


Design and Development

The training at your company needs to have an impact. Our approach to building a learning experience starts with a detailed performance mapping process to make sure our design precisely matches your business objectives and fits your learners' needs. This sets the tone for the entire project and results in an impactful training experience.  


Learning Technologies

Your company's training needs to be innovative. Our focus on using the right technology for your organization's unique training needs means we will explore the best methods to get the job done. Whether we develop a training solution with gamification and AR/VR, or we combine motion graphics and microlearning in a blended learning solution, the result will be innovative, engaging, and scalable
data.product_description: Award-winning corporate training and design solutions for the top companies in the world.

initial_reviews.review_title: Quality and flexibility of training program.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about AllenComm?
The best self-help and skills-learning programs have given me confidence over time, The time I used to lack communication while expressing myself, is now I always end up being a good and confident presenter.

What do you dislike about AllenComm?
I can't say that I dislike anything about Allencomm, I have been a client of Allencomm for 1 year and i have been very happy with the training programs and cusotmer services.

Recommendations to others considering AllenComm:
I am very impressed with Allencomm and I would definitely recommend them anyone looking for corporate training.

What problems is AllenComm solving and how is that benefiting you?
The experienced instructors of the training program have benefitted me by upgrading my level of skills and knowledge, and the best feature it gives is choosing the schedule according to you.

What do you like best about AllenComm?
AllenComm is brand which provides level quality corporate training to people which help them survive them in corporate industry by learning with ease and flexibility thereby focusing towards success.

What do you dislike about AllenComm?
AllenComm is headed direction and becoming master in its own field but may be lacking in some areas which is resolved will definitely lead way to success. It may improve its customer service, feedback mechanism which indeed can help organize their learning path.

Recommendations to others considering AllenComm:
AllenComm is great platform to use if you want to develop and enhance your corporate skills and bring it to next level.

What problems is AllenComm solving and how is that benefiting you?
AllenComm is one of coolest brand out in market which solves problem of training in corporate industry. It provides quality level training in corporate industry thereby becoming a leader in digital learning industry.
